subject: Missing Part
description_text:
Hello,

I am missing a bracket for my brake pedal for the Haptic kit I ordered in December.  The box had 2 brackets not 3, can you send me a replacement part?


Attached is a copy of my original order number.

Thank you.

Liam.



Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>

conversations.body_text: Hi Liam - Informed Design,  Could you please confirm which bracket is missing? Is it for the throttle pedal, the brake pedal, or the clutch pedal?Â

I have the one for the clutch, I assume the brake and throttle are the same, so I need a second brake/throttle bracket please.

Thank you!

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
Hi Liam - Informed Design,    Please provide a photo showing the mounting bracket you received, and we will resend the missing part for you.

Hi there,  please see photo attached of the two brackets  i have.

My address is

29 Honeymyrtle Road, Kellyville,  Nsw 2155, Sydney, Australia


Thank you!
Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
Hi Liam - Informed Design,    Do you need a new U-bracket? We can send you replacement U-shaped brake and throttle bracket.

Yes please! That is all I need

Thank you

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
Hi Liam - Informed Design,    This is your logistics tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047245837974
